name: Physic Shapes
description:
DESTROY ALL SHAPES BEFORE YOU RUN OUT OF SHOTS!

The game is very simple with 1 level where you have limited number of shots to destroy all present shapes with a ball.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Physic shapes is a tiny game that hides me learning about game physics basics under its hood. 

I applied theory about collisions, velocity, bouncing, normal vectors and other subjects and this project is a demonstration of that gained knowledge. It is not perfect but it was fun creating it from scratch in the school's engine.

[Please be aware that I am not the owner of the engine and sharing it outside the academy circles of Saxion university is not allowed so, plese don't copy any parts of the game's code.]
